name: puppetcam
description: Capture all automated actions in a browser and export as a video

scripts.install-manifest-key: cp .manifest.json.key manifest.json.new && tail -n +2 ./chrome-extensions/screen-recording/manifest.json >> manifest.json.new && mv manifest.json.new ./recorder-extension/manifest.json
scripts.install-extension: git submodule init && git submodule update && npm run copy-extension && npm run install-manifest-key
